content: tails a 1 row below & behind ears 1 row above eyes pull through next st & poke into the same st hole b c © 2021 by faye mini feet ch3 half_double_crochet into the 2nd chain from hook sc1 feets placement front of the feet sew on mouth and cheeks on row 7 embroidery thread dmc 3706 for cheeks embroidery thread dmc 838 for mouth if you are using stick-on eyes stick eyes on row 7 right in the space between cheek and mouth © 2021 by faye w mouth placement there should be 9 stitches from the left to the right ear count to the 5th stitch and that will be the center for the w mouth a b center of 5th stitch row 7 c d e f please feel free to message me if you have any questions or concerns if you want to see what s on my hook visit me on my instagram page instagram com/createbyfaye thank you © 2021 by faye
